title: Project Configuration Schema
description: Schema for project configuration YAML file

space.description: The space identifier for the project

platformType.description: The type of platform being used

cloudStagingConnection.description: Cloud staging connection string or reference

artifactsNaming.description: Naming conventions and prefixes/suffixes used when generating artifacts (tables, views, schemas).

suffixLiveViews.description: Suffix applied to live view names.

suffixChangesView.description: Suffix applied to change table/view names.

suffixCurrentView.description: Suffix applied to current view names.

suffixHistoryViews.description: Suffix applied to history view names.

suffixLiveHistoryViews.description: Suffix applied to live history view names.

suffixInternalSchema.description: Suffix used for internal schema names.

prefixHeaderColumns.description: Prefix applied to header columns in change tables.

prefixSchema.description: Template or prefix used when creating schemas for tasks.

defaultSchemaNameOption.description: How to format schema names by default.
